data.title: Edgar Rice Burroughs – Audio Books, Best Sellers, Author Bio
data.meta_description: Learn more about Edgar Rice Burroughs. Browse Edgar Rice Burroughs’s best-selling audiobooks and newest titles. Discover more authors you’ll love listening to on Audible.
data.text:
Llana of Gathol (English Edition)

By: Edgar Rice Burroughs

Narrated by: Alan Crookham

Length: 8 hrs and 45 mins

Unabridged

Overall

0 out of 5 stars 0

Performance

0 out of 5 stars 0

Story

0 out of 5 stars 0

Llana of Gathol is a unique volume in John Carter’s Barsoom series. While the previous books featured a single story throughout, Llana of Gathol is an anthology of four shorter tales written later in Edgar Rice Burroughs’ life.

Tarzan of the Apes had heard only rumors of the Kavuru—a strange, evil tribe said to have long reaped their human prey from among the local natives. But when they stole the daughter of Muviro, chief of the Waziri, the Lord of the Jungle sets out in search of their legend-shrouded village....
